metadata.shortInfo: This track shows the extent of G4 DNA signature. G4 motif is 'Intrinsically mutagenic motif, probably because it can form secondary structures during DNA replication'. Data are from Kruisselbrink E et al. (2008) Curr Biol 'Mutagenic Capacity of Endogenous G4 DNA Underlies Genome Instability in ....'.
